title: PsychronPro watch face
summary: Its a nice scifi style watchface.  With the look of future! Science fiction! HUD
description: Psychron is the most wonderful scifi style watchface with the look of Future.NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.Features on one face:✔ 3D Parallax effect (To be enabled in settings)✔ Launch screen animation✔ Compass✔ Weather icon✔ Temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius)✔ Rotating circle animation✔ Rotating seconds✔ Watch/phone battery level✔ Step count triggered per hour ✔ Month, Date and Day✔ Hexagon background✔ Color picker for outer circle contour✔ Color picker for weather icon✔ Display in dimmed modeSupport all models:✔ LG G Watch R✔ Motorola Moto 360✔ Samsung Gear Live✔ Asus Zen Watch✔ LG G watch✔ Sony SmartWatch 3Weather support: http://openweathermap.org/How to launch:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press the watch screen and select Psychron from the watch face picker3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.It's the first one of our scifi series. Stay tuned for our next watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Psychron is the most wonderful scifi style watchface with the look of Future.
NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.


Features on one face:
✔ 3D Parallax effect (To be enabled in settings)
✔ Launch screen animation
✔ Compass
✔ Weather icon
✔ Temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius)
✔ Rotating circle animation
✔ Rotating seconds
✔ Watch/phone battery level
✔ Step count triggered per hour
✔ Month, Date and Day
✔ Hexagon background
✔ Color picker for outer circle contour
✔ Color picker for weather icon
✔ Display in dimmed mode


Support all models:
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus Zen Watch
✔ LG G watch
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3


Weather support:
http://openweathermap.org/


How to launch:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press the watch screen and select Psychron from the watch face picker
3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.


It's the first one of our scifi series. Stay tuned for our next watch face.
comments: Had the standard one for a while and liked it,so I upgraded. But a bit disappointed with the customising options, would like to change the colour on the hour and min mark's. Also be able to brighten them, and maybe change the shapes and colours. But still happy with the purchase.

Hands need to be brighter and a watch battery sub dial would be a killer add in imo Would like to see more user options more colors to play with etc also i cannot change my weather color it goes to the color wheel i pick but it still stays white must be a bug?
Nice Work alright on the moto 360 but doesn't work on the hauwie watch as near as I can tell all of the features don't work.
Needs more customisation option's. If I had more option's I would rate higher.
Not bad. The hands are too dim.
